item.title: Post 1 - Basic linear algebra in q
item.description: Basic linear algebra in q - matrices and vectors - add, subtract, dot product, etc.

item.title: Post 2.a - Simple Linear Regression - Part a
item.description: Background theory and formulation for simple linear regression.

item.description: An example of simple linear regression implemented using q.

item.title: Post 3 - Elementary Cellular Automata
item.description: Implementing elementary cellular automata in q.
